key.name: window-x
key.summary: Most recent x position of window
key.description: Most recent x position of window

key.name: window-y
key.summary: Most recent y position of window
key.description: Most recent y position of window

key.name: default-font-family
key.description: Default font family to use for the editor.

key.name: default-font-size
key.description: Default font size to use for the editor.

key.name: item-color
key.description: Last used item color displayed in toolbar.

key.name: item-alpha
key.summary: Alpha value to use with item-color
key.description: Last used item color alpha value displayed in toolbar.

key.name: stroke-width
key.description: Last used stroke width displayed in toolbar. Valid values are "width1", "width2", "width3", "width4".

key.name: dash-pattern
key.description: Last used stroke dash pattern displayed in toolbar. Valid values are "none", "short", "long".

key.name: blur-radius
key.description: Last used blur radius displayed in toolbar.

key.name: font
key.description: Last used font displayed in toolbar.

key.name: last-directory
key.description: Last successfully opened or saved directory.

key.name: screenshot-delay
key.summary: Number seconds of delay after selecting the 'Focused Window' screenshot option.
key.description: Number seconds of delay after selecting the 'Focused Window' screenshot option.

key.name: screenshot-include-win
key.summary: Set to true to allow the Annotator window to be included in the screenshot.
key.description: Set to true to allow the Annotator window to be included in the screenshot. Set to false to hide the Annotator window during the screenshot.

key.name: last-export
key.summary: Name of the last exported type
key.description: Name of the last exported type. Supported values are: jpeg, tiff, bmp, png, pdf, svg.
